attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: His great!!we love him..His put so much into the British family society for such a long time.His long service to tv and his Charityable work his commitment to others  is above most people that work on tv nowadays..And obviously not forgetting his TWINKLE TOES!!GO BRUCE'E..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
